api_list.api_description: Get the fiat price of the currencies for the available trading pairs.

optional_parameters.name: currencies
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of cryptocurrencies to be converted into fiat (e.g., 'BTC,ETH').

query: What are the current cryptocurrency exchange rates against USD on Coinbase, and can you also get the fiat prices of BTC and ETH from Kucoin?
